mapper.update: update evaluat set evaluat_like_num=#{evaluat_like_num} where evaluat_code=#{evaluat_code}
mapper.select: select evaluat_code, evaluat_id, evaluat_score, evaluat_content, evaluat_like_num, movie_code, to_char(evaluat_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as evaluat_date from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from evaluat where movie_code=#{movie_code} order by evaluat_code desc) tt ) where rn>=#{e_startNum} and rn<=#{e_endNum}
select sum(evaluat_score) from evaluat where movie_code=#{movie_code}
select count(*) from evaluat where movie_code=#{movie_code}
select count(*) from evaluat where evaluat_id=#{evaluat_id} and movie_code=#{movie_code}
select count(*) from evaluat_like where like_id=#{like_id} and evaluat_code=#{evaluat_code}
select count(*) from evaluat_like where evaluat_code=#{evaluat_code}
